title: "Transforming Reality: Harnessing the Power of Sound and Self-Hypnosis"
first_phrase: This text introduces a new way of speaking and influencing oneself and reality through the power of sounds and symbols, which is taught in the second part of the course provided by the ISI-CNV school. The ability to implement such techniques is vital for professionals and personal development enthusiasts alike. The text is followed by a video of Dr. Paret demonstrating a deep hypnotic state induction without using words. Readers are encouraged to explore the practical techniques offered in the course and check out the school's professional master's program.
content: ________________ Qui sotto: Il dr. Paret in una dimostrazione ipnotica inducente uno stato profondo senza utilizzare parole https://youtu.be/q5rpezKTDZE ________________ Informazioni sui nostri MASTER per utilizzo PERSONALE e PROFESSIONALE (sia per chi è già professionista sia per chi vuole riconvertire la propria attività lavorativa e lavorare nel campo del miglioramento personale e del benessere della persona con l’ipnosi e tecniche collegate) a: http://www.neurolinguistic.com/blog/professional-master-ipnosi-pnl/ E chiedete informazioni anche sulle nostre prossime iniziative ________________
last_phrase: In summary, the video demonstrates Dr. Paret inducing a deep state of hypnosis without the use of words. If you're interested in utilizing hypnosis and related techniques for personal or professional growth, visit our website to learn more about our MASTER programs. Don't hesitate to reach out for more information on our upcoming events.
